name: Refuge (itch)
description:
Game Description

A small game which is a remake of 1982 classic, Moon Patrol that has been influenced by artist Eva Hesse. This is telling an abstract story of Eva's experience of her fleeing her home country of  Germany  as a young child.  The game uses recreated pieces of her artwork to represent everything in the game. From flying sculptors, stringy looking backgrounds making up everything seen in the game.

Rules

To avoid obstacles and projectiles and escape to the end of the level. To do this you have to move from side to side and jump over anything in your path. 

First Game release, not perfect nor polished so be gentle.
